abstract: In a news conference at its headquarters, the company revealed plans for a redesigned ESPN.com, an app-based children’s learning service, and sales of its films on Vudu.
snippet: In a news conference at its headquarters, the company revealed plans for a redesigned ESPN.com, an app-based children’s learning service, and sales of its films on Vudu.
lead_paragraph: BURBANK, Calif. – Disney on Friday announced several digital and mobile projects, including a redesign of ESPN.com, an app-based children’s learning product called Imagicademy and sales of its films on Walmart’s streaming service, Vudu.

headline.main: Disney Announces New Digital and Mobile Products
